hdc_reference.description: Uniquely identifies the clinic to HDC. This value will be generated and provided by HDC.

emr_id.description: The unique identifier of the source record within the EMR.

emr_reference.description: No set purpose. For use by the EMR adapter.

emr.description: Name of the EMR that this clinic is using (e.g. Med Access, MOIS, Oscar, Profile).
